snippet.title: Ringer - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3308190/Ringer/

The marble roguelike. Ringer reinvents the classic game of marbles with a deckbuilding twist. Discover game breaking synergies, defeat menacing bosses, and accumulate an ever increasing score in this thrilling roguelike!


#Gamedev #indiedev #steam #gameplay #announcement
